column1: ! FOR SINGLE CELL DROP WITH ELLIPSE.PY:
! List of information about wind in the area since the last burn per timestep in each year
! step number (StepsPerYear is a surfgridlist item)
! uavg = average wind in u direction in m/s
! vavg = average wind in v direction in m/s
! uvar = average wind variance in u direction in m/s
! vvar = average wind variance in v direction in m/s
